backend/main.mo: Actor exposes a test method that returns the caller principal and traps if the caller is anonymous.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for build/reference documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing generator state, template selection, scrolling, and rendering all page sections.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: UI component for Internet Identity login/logout that shows principal info and backend whoami result.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Scroll-triggered animation wrapper using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Canvas export utility generating a birthday card image with background, text, and branding.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image for card export with cross-origin support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Utility for wrapping canvas text into multiple lines with width constraints.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Static list of example birthday wishes with names, relationships, tones, and messages.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Defines relationship, tone, language, and personality option lists for the generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a generated BirthdayPack into a single shareable text block.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Builds a birthday message pack by assembling multiple text sections based on form data and language phrase sets.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides localized phrase dictionaries and a helper to return phrase sets based on selected language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized form data for the birthday generator using predefined lists and sample names.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for generator form fields, message packs, and template IDs.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns Tailwind class strings for templates by combining base styling with template‑specific styles.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Exports a registry of background image paths and a helper to retrieve them by key.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines metadata for all card templates, including visuals, colors, and background images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the current identity, refreshing queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook that reports whether an element is within the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference using a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to fetch the authenticated caller's principal, returning null if anonymous.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for a neon dark theme, and custom utility classes including gradients, neon colors, shadows, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides a function to copy text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Exports a helper to shorten a principal string by keeping prefix and suffix characters.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share URL by encoding a text message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Renders a filterable grid of sample birthday wishes using UI cards and reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Displays a list of FAQ items inside an accordion with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Shows the site footer with branding, links, and attribution including a dynamic year.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the birthday pack generator form with validation, randomization, copy/share actions, and output handling.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Creates the animated hero section with title, tagline, auth controls, and buttons to start generating or view examples.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Renders privacy policy, terms of service, and contact sections using styled cards with static legal text.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Displays generated birthday outputs with copy, WhatsApp sharing, and card export actions.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Shows Free and Pro pricing plans with feature lists and styled cards.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Provides a template selector and previews the selected card style using generated content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, neon colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about project state, features, requirements, and architectural notes.
